title: Hotel Booking
description: Developed a responsive hotel booking website with real-time availability checks, interactive UI, and an intuitive reservation system. Implemented seamless navigation, secure booking forms, and a user-friendly interface to enhance the overall booking experience.

title: ToDo List
description: Built a feature-rich To-Do List app with task addition, editing, deletion, and local storage support for data persistence. Designed a clean, interactive, and responsive UI with drag-and-drop functionality to improve user experience and task management efficiency.

title: Real-Time Chat Application
description: Developed a real-time chat application using WebSockets for instant messaging, ensuring seamless and efficient communication. Integrated user authentication, real-time updates, message history storage, and a responsive UI to enhance the chat experience across different devices.
